overview:
In addition to his role with ENSYS Capital LLC, Jim Bryja also serves as Chief Operating Officer and Partner at Midtown Consulting Group. Midtown Consulting Group is a general management and technology consulting company, and a partner firm with ENSYS Capital. He actively consults in the areas of sales & marketing effectiveness, product management, competitive benchmarking, market research and business operations and strategy.

Jim has over twenty five years of hands on management experience in finance, sales management, customer service, logistics, market research, international business, M&A and manufacturing management with a wide range of clients in the energy, forest products, packaging, financial services, real estate development and manufacturing industries. Mr. Bryja also has extensive experience developing industrial commodity trading strategies, price risk mitigation strategies, industrial brands and long-term business planning.
